results.deck: Futurama is a game based on the award winning television show, and features many of the original cast members and creative writing.
results.name: Futurama

results.deck: A survival horror game set in the British Museum. You play as either Dr. Darien Dane or his assistant Victoria Sutton on a search to retrieve a cursed Egyptian artifact recently stolen from the museum.
results.name: Curse: The Eye of Isis

results.deck: A volleyball game with a mature edge.
results.name: Outlaw Volleyball: Remixed

results.deck: A fighting game based on the Shrek movie franchise. It is similar in structure to the Smash Bros and Power Stone games.
results.name: Shrek SuperSlam

results.deck: First entry in the Splinter Cell series.  You are Sam Fisher, a highly-trained covert operative working for a division of the NSA known as Third Echelon. As Sam, you must infiltrate heavily guarded areas in order to combat the threat of terrorism.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell

results.deck: The King of Fighters '99 is the sixth installment of the King of Fighters series, introducing new gameplay mechanics such as the "Striker" system. It also introduces a new protagonist, K', as well as a new, darker story arc involving the mysterious cartel called NESTS.
results.name: The King of Fighters '99

results.deck: In Whirl Tour, players play as Wasa B; A roadie on the search for the members of the band "Flipside."
results.name: Whirl Tour

results.deck: 3DO's 2001 entry into their High Heat Major League Baseball series
results.name: High Heat Major League Baseball 2002

results.deck: A licensed first-person shooter created by Rebellion featuring the popular 2000AD comic book character Judge Dredd.
results.name: Judge Dredd: Dredd vs. Death

results.deck: Singstar Norske Hits is an installment in the Singstar franchise, featuring a mixture of Norwegian and previously released songs.
results.name: SingStar Norske Hits

results.deck: Time Crisis series spin off.
results.name: Crisis Zone

results.deck: Busted out of death row, inmate James Earl Cash wakes up to find himself in a snuff film directed by a man who calls himself Starkweather.
results.name: Manhunt

results.deck: The Legend of Spyro: The Eternal Night is the second part of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. Cynder has been rescued from the power of the Dark Master. The Ape King, Gaul, has now risen to power and is intent on resurrecting the Dark Master.
results.name: The Legend of Spyro: The Eternal Night

results.deck: Driving Emotion Type-S is Square's entry into the racing-simulation genre. It is greatly disliked in (at least) the West due to its high difficulty.
results.name: Driving Emotion Type-S

results.deck: Mega Man Anniversary Collection contains the first 8 Mega Man entries in the franchise, along with many extra features and unlockable games.
results.name: Mega Man Anniversary Collection

results.deck: Gungriffon Blaze was a Playstation 2 launch title. Set in a devastated post World War III world, the player plays as a mech equipped UN soldier who must maintain peace.
results.name: Gungriffon Blaze

results.deck: Wallace & Gromit face off against Feathers McGraw, the villainous penguin, who has escaped from the penguin enclosure and taken over the Zoo.
results.name: Wallace & Gromit in Project Zoo

results.deck: Cart Racing meets Star Wars: Episode I in a merger small franchise vehicles and big franchise heads.
results.name: Star Wars: Super Bombad Racing

results.deck: SOCOM was one of the first popular online games for the PS2. In many ways, it revolutionized online gaming on the PS2.
results.name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs

results.deck: A horror-themed FMV game for the PS2
results.name: The Fear

results.deck: A 3D version of the classic game.
results.name: Frogger Beyond

results.deck: NFL Street is EA's first foray into arcade style football games. Based around extreme hits and fast plays, NFL Street separates itself from other arcade games with its stylish visuals and Gamebreaker mechanics from the NBA Street games.
results.name: NFL Street

results.deck: The Dark Knight returns to stop a series of seemingly unrelated crimes in this 3D action platformer based on The New Batman Adventures animated TV series.
results.name: Batman: Vengeance

results.deck: Run Like Hell is an action adventure third-person shooter game for the PS2 and Xbox.
results.name: Run Like Hell

results.deck: The FOREth entry in the light-hearted Hot Shots Golf franchise.
results.name: Hot Shots Golf Fore!

results.deck: This is Midway's second game in the Slugfest series.
results.name: MLB SlugFest 20-04

results.deck: Guitar Hero allows players to step into the shoes of a rock god and play some of the most famous guitar songs of all time.
results.name: Guitar Hero

results.deck: Flipnic is a abstract and surreal Pinball experience developed by SCEI and Published by Capcom
results.name: Flipnic: Ultimate Pinball

results.deck: Silent Hill 4 is the fourth installment of the Survival-Horror series of the same name. This edition stars Henry Townshend, who is possessed remotely by the town of Silent Hill and forced to face an undead serial killer and multiple hellish dimensions in order to escape from his own apartment.
results.name: Silent Hill 4: The Room

results.deck: The first installment of backyard basketball series, where you can play as cartoon versions of real NBA and WNBA players.
results.name: Backyard Basketball

results.deck: Intellivision Lives is a collection of 68 classic Intellivision games.
results.name: Intellivision Lives!

results.deck: The third entry in the MLB SlugFest baseball game series.
results.name: MLB Slugfest Loaded

results.deck: The fifth game of the Twisted Metal franchise. It occurs outside of the "normal" continuity and has a much darker tone than the previous games.
results.name: Twisted Metal: Black

results.deck: East meets west in this niche action game by Acquire.
results.name: Samurai Western

results.deck: A compilation of the first two Super Monkey Ball games with additional stages and mini-games thrown in, released for the Xbox and PlayStation 2 instead of the GameCube. Contains over 300 stages of ball-rolling puzzle action.
results.name: Super Monkey Ball Deluxe

results.deck: Unlimited SaGa is a Japanese RPG with experimental (even for a SaGa game) gameplay akin to tabletop RPGs
results.name: Unlimited SaGa

results.deck: Explore the Forbidden Land as Wander, a young warrior who must slay sixteen Colossi in order to restore the life of a sacrificed maiden.
results.name: Shadow of the Colossus

results.deck: 007: Everything or Nothing is a 3rd-person action game from Electronic Arts in the James Bond franchise. The game features Pierce Brosnan's likeness and voice as Bond, Willem Dafoe as the chief antagonist and other notable actors as new and recurring characters in an original movie-style adventure.
results.name: 007: Everything or Nothing

results.deck: Test Drive Unlimited is an open world racing game that takes place on the island of Oahu in Hawaii. It features over 1000 miles of open roads which you may traverse in a hot Ferrari or in a blazing Kawasaki race bike.
results.name: Test Drive Unlimited

results.deck: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance is the fifth installment in the violent fighting game franchise and the first "revival" of the series, introducing multiple fighting styles for each character.
results.name: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance

results.deck: Team up with the CSI Las Vegas crew to solve five murder cases as the newest member of the team. Put your detective skills to test and see if you can crack the case.
results.name: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation - 3 Dimensions of Murder

results.deck: Psyvariar 2 is the sequel to one of the most intense top down shooter games ever made. In Psyvariar 2, there are two types of ships to control; one that levels up by shooting and another that levels up by absorbing bullets.
results.name: Psyvariar 2

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 4 is a hack and slash video game and the fourth installment in the popular Dynasty Warriors series. Dynasty Warriors 4 was developed by Omega Force and published by Koei. The game is available on PlayStation 2 (PS2) and Xbox and is based on a series of books called Romance of the Three Kingdoms, written by Luo Guanzhong
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 4

results.deck: Hitman: Contracts is the third entry in the Hitman series. A wounded 47 seeks refuge in a shoddy apartment and reminisces his earlier missions in the darkness and the rain... Contracts takes place after mission 3 of Blood Money.
results.name: Hitman: Contracts

results.deck: In a world still recovering from an apocalyptic conflict, a young man heads out into the world to make a name for himself.  Along the way, he'll contend with everything from raging marauders and out-of-control robots to a religious cult of devoted body builders.
results.name: Metal Saga

results.deck: A James Bond first-person shooter from Eurocom.
results.name: 007: Nightfire

results.deck: Madden '06 introduces  the Truck Stick and Superstar Mode to EA's popular Madden franchise.
results.name: Madden NFL 06

results.deck: Sakura Taisen V Episode 0 is a prequel to Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love. However, unlike the other entries in the Sakura Wars series, Episode 0 is an action-adventure game, pitting players in the role of Gemini Sunrise as she and her horse Larry combat evil.
results.name: Sakura Taisen V Episode 0: Arano no Samurai Musume

results.deck: Shinseiki Evangelion: Koutetsu no Girlfriend, also known as Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel, is a Japanese-style text-heavy adventure game, which follows the characters from the Evangelion anime in a side story that takes place roughly around the time of the early 'teens episodes.
results.name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Koutetsu no Girlfriend

results.deck: Gladius is a strategy RPG from LucasArts that puts you at the helm of a school of gladiators, and tasks you with forging the best such school in all the world.
results.name: Gladius

results.deck: Final Fight is a classic beat-em-up game developed by Capcom featuring a memorable cast of characters, including Guy, Cody, and the first and only mustachioed ex-pro-wrestler turned mayor, Mike Haggar. Released for the CPS arcade system in 1989 and then ported to the SNES and other home systems.
results.name: Final Fight

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories is the first of the "Stories" series where you play in Liberty City as Toni Cipriani. It was originally released exclusively on the PlayStation Portable (PSP), but was ported to the PlayStation 2 in the following year.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories

results.deck: The Angel of Darkness is the sixth game in the Tomb Raider series, and the first for the PlayStation 2. It features a lot of design differences and is widely considered the weakest game in the series.
results.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness

results.deck: A skating game featuring characters from popular Disney franchises.
results.name: Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure

results.deck: Team up as Homer, Marge, Bart, and Lisa as you enter a strange and vast video game world, with parodies of popular series like EverQuest, Medal of Honor, and Grand Theft Auto. Popluar video-game characters such as Sonic and Mario have their own parodies too.
results.name: The Simpsons Game

results.deck: NCAA Football 2005 is the 2004 installment of EA's NCAA Football franchise. It bears former Pittsburgh Panther and current Arizona Cardinal Larry Fitzgerald on the cover.
results.name: NCAA Football 2005

results.deck: International Track and Field 2000 is the follow up to 1996's International Track and Field, featuring new events and updated graphics.
results.name: International Track and Field 2000

results.deck: The ninth title in the SingStar franchise for PlayStation 2.
results.name: SingStar Anthems

results.deck: Obscure: The Aftermath, is a horror survival game sequel to the game "Obscure".
results.name: Obscure: The Aftermath

results.deck: Cabela's African Safari is a 2006 release in the trophy hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's African Safari

results.deck: The first rule of Fight Club is: you do not talk about Fight Club.
results.name: Fight Club

results.deck: Mojib Ribbon is a Japanese calligraphy-themed rap rhythm game for the PS2 developed by NanaOn-Sha and helmed by Masaya Matsuura of Parappa the Rapper fame. Released only in Japan, players take on the role of several characters who compose rap lyrics in real time with a mystical brush controlled by the right stick on the PS2 controller.
results.name: Mojib Ribbon

results.deck: NHL 2005 is the 14th game in the EA Sports NHL franchise.
results.name: NHL 2005

results.deck: Be on the big screen with Eyetoy: Play.  This mini-game collection uses the Eyetoy to put you in the game.
results.name: EyeToy: Play

results.deck: Jennifer Tate enters a dark world of magic and demons as she journeys to find her boyfriend. Her companion on this journey is a noble-sounding gargoyle named Scree. Along the way, Jennifer undergoes a myriad of physical and emotional transformations as she ventures from one world to the next.
results.name: Primal

results.deck: Sega's fifth NFL game and the first to use the ESPN license. Though it is a follow-up to NFL 2K3, the game's official title does not include "2K".
results.name: ESPN NFL Football

results.deck: A golf game for Xbox and PlayStation 2.
results.name: Outlaw Golf 2

results.deck: Play as the Spartan warrior, Kratos, as he cuts his way through armies of mythological creatures on a path to kill Ares, the God of War, and gain redemption for his past sins.
results.name: God of War

results.deck: Gregory Horror Show is a game in which players take on the role of a boy or girl and collect souls from guests staying at a hotel in another dimension.
results.name: Gregory Horror Show

results.deck: Kessen II is a real-time strategy game and follow-up to the PS2 launch title, Kessen. The game shifts the setting from Japan to the Three Kingdoms era of China.
results.name: Kessen II

results.deck: Enthusia is Konami's only attempt at a Gran Turismo-like racing sim so far, and one that has remained somewhat obscure due to being released just after Gran Turismo 4.
results.name: Enthusia Professional Racing

results.deck: Agent 47 is forced out of retirement and takes up contracts again in order to find the whereabouts of his captured friend.
results.name: Hitman 2: Silent Assassin

results.deck: Launching alongside the Playstation 2, this is the 5th console entry of Namco's flagship racer. An arcade port, titled Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle, was released in 2001 and is to date the last Ridge Racer to be released for arcades.
results.name: Ridge Racer V

results.deck: In this terrible game in the Evil Dead franchise, Ash Williams has to once again stop the forces of evil from taking over the world. Hail to the king baby!
results.name: Evil Dead: A Fistful of Boomstick

results.deck: UEFA Challenge is a football video game for PlayStation, PlayStation 2 and Microsoft Windows, developed by Infogrames Entertainment.
results.name: UEFA Challenge

results.deck: A puzzle-action boss rush game developed by Treasure for the Playstation 2. Linda and her demon-possessed scarf must battle against the vanity demons possessing her twelve older sisters.
results.name: Stretch Panic

results.deck: Steambot Chronicles is a game originally released for the PS2 in Japan under the name Bumpy Trot. The game's main focus is on Trotmobiles, mechs used to do a large variety of things in the world of Steambot Chronicles.
results.name: Steambot Chronicles

results.deck: The sequel to Star Wars: Battlefront adds new unlockable classes, huge space battles, and the ability to play Hero characters. Battlefront II also features revamped Galactic Conquest and story modes.
results.name: Star Wars: Battlefront II

results.deck: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 is the second game in the Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX series.
results.name: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2

results.deck: The follow-up to Vice City takes the free-roaming violence to the state of San Andreas, an analog to early '90s California, where ruthless gangs battle for control of the streets.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
